title: RGMC Hamirpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 26 Junior Resident Posts
description: Dr. Radhakrishnan Government Medical College, Hamirpur (RGMC Hamirpur) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 26 Junior Resident Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS can apply for the RGMC Hamirpur Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection ...
